authors.name: Nicholas Sherman
authors.affiliation: University of Virginia Biomolecular Analysis Facility Core

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"1sfht","text":"This protocol uses a similar method to Protocol_008 but retains the chloroform phase containing lipids and other very hydrophobic molecules. Extractions are done in a way to make sure the final sample is mostly lipids. This type of sample will need to be run on a different column using different buffers from those used for the aqueous/methanol metabolites.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"co1kp","text":"The dry down of this phase is best done using a stream of inert nitrogen to minimize oxidation of lipids and directly before analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"fvtk4","text":"Microtubes 1.5 mL - SEAL-RITE® 1.5 ML MICROCENTRIFUGE TUBES color: natural, USA Scientific","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4c7c","text":"Reinforced tubes 2 mL- with screw caps and O-rings,  Fisherbrand™, White/Opaque, part number 5-340-162.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f7o5r","text":"Stainless steel balls - OMNI International 2.4mm Metal Bead Media 500g SKU 19-640","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bti6d","text":"Pipette tips - Fisherbrand™, yellow, part number: 02-681-151.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ii6i","text":"Water - Fisher chemical, W64, Optima LC/MS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vkuf","text":"FA - Fisher chemical, A117-50, Formic Acid, Optima LC/MS ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa3o7","text":"Methanol - Fisher chemical, A456-212, Methanol, Optima LC/MS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9p95m","text":"Chloroform - Millipore sigma, CX1050P-1, Chloroform, HPLC grade","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a68hv","text":"2 to 20 µL Micropipette - Gilson™ F144056MT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"33m04","text":"20 to 200 µL Micropipette - Gilson™ F144058MT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c46h4","text":"100 to 1000 µL Micropipette - Gilson™ F144059MT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atfa2","text":"VWR Analog Vortex mixer - CAT No: 58816-121","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dcbpd","text":"Thermo Scientific™ integrated Speedvac Concentrator CAT No: SPD1030-115","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vvls","text":"Eppendorf 5415D Digital Centrifuge ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"600f3","text":"Thermo Scientific™ Thermal Mixer with blocks, Block, 24 x 2.0mL microtubes, CAT No: 13687713","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91pvr","text":"Fisherbrand™ bead Mill 24 homogenizer CAT No: 15-340-163","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1fm5a","text":"Thermo Scientific™ Amber glass vials, 2mL, CERT5000-74W","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6j0e3","text":"SPLASH LipidoMIX™ Internal Standard - Part number 330707, Avanti Ploar Lipids, Inc.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhv4e","text":"WHEATON® MicroLiter® insert, 300uL, conical with spring Part number: 11-0000-100","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40hec","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmhr7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c54j4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c4jk1","text":"To each sample containing 100 uL add 750 µL of -20°C cold Chloroform:methanol (2:1) mixture and vortex","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6hnb","text":"Shake tubes vigorously for 30 min at 4°C in temperature temperature-controlled thermal shaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7p0o","text":"Add 400 µL of water, shake vigorously, and centrifuge for 10 min at 10000 rpm for phase separation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6kj5u","text":"Discard the top aq. methanolic phase (if interested in soluble metabolite, recover this phase. See BAF_Protocol_008)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"jlsb","text":"Recover the Lower phase to new clean Eppendorf","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"rom4","text":"To each tube with 500 µL of chloroform phase, add 500 µL of cold Chloroform:methanol (2:1) mixture","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5r85c","text":"Vortex and shaken vigorously for 30 min at 4°C in temperature controlled thermal shaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2ija","text":"Add 200 µL of water, shake vigorously, centrifuge for 10 min at 10000 rpm and recover the lower organic phase as a lipid mixture in glass tubes and store at -80°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7sko0","text":"Before running, add 10 µL of Avanti Splash Lipidomix to each sample as internal standard and dry samples under gentle stream of N2 using a Recti-VapTM Evaporator (Thermo Fisher Scientific) at 40°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"807l0","text":"Transfer 100 uL to borosilicate glass inserts kept inside a screw-capped glass autosampler vials (Agilent)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"enlk","text":"Place the sample in reinforced tubes: Frozen tissue slice or lyophilized stools. For cell pellets – mix well with 50-100 uL of water transfer solution and suspended cells to reinforced tubes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6roag","text":"To each sample add 5 stainless steel balls, 750 µL of -20°C cold Chloroform:methanol (2:1) mixture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61iim","text":"Disrupt cells/tissues with Fisher Bead Mill 24 (speed: 5m/s, time: 20 sec, number of cycle: 3, dwell/pause between runs: 10 sec).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aufph","text":"Shake tubes vigorously for 30 min at 4°C in temperature temperature-controlled thermal shaker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6uk19","text":"Add 400 µL of water, shake vigorously, and centrifuge for 10 min at 10000 rpm for phase separation. Discard the top aq. methanolic phase (if interested in soluble metabolite, recover this phase. See BAF_Protocol_08)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"edqmb","text":"Recover the Lower phase to new clean Eppendorf - extract lipids. Perform steps 06-11 from the above protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: BAF_Protocol_009 Metabolomics: Lipid Extraction
